title: (repost) varidian - the specter
body:
Name: Varidian
Title: The Spectre

HP: 537 + 65.47 Per LVL Total 1700
MP: 376 + 33.76 Per LVL Total 950

AD: 0 Doesn't Change
AP: 43 + 3.35 Per LVL total 100
(Basic Attacks Do Magic Damage Based Off AP And Cannot Crit)
AR: 28 + 2.05 Per LVL Total 63
MR: 32 + 1 Per LVL total 50
Movement Speed: 350
Attack Speed: 0.625 +1.7% Per LVL Total 0.805

Passive: Power Siphon
Every Time You Hit An Enemy With An Ability You Gain Mana
4 Per Hit
10 Per Kill
Doubled If You Hit All Enemies
Gain Mana And Health Regen per 5 Equal To 0.5% Total Mana

Q: Mental Blast - ( Skill Shot + Cone )
Shoots Towards The Cursor Before Exploding In A Cone
Mana-Cost 60/55/50/45/40
Cool-Down 12/11/10/9/8
Does 40/80/120/160/200 +75% AP In A Line
Then 20/40/60/80/100 +50% AP In A Cone

W: Spectral Shift - ( A.O.E + Blink )
Sinks Into The Ground Causing A.O.E Burst In all Directions
Then Reappears At Cursor Max Distance 200
Mana-Cost 70 (All Ranks)
Cool-Down 12 Seconds All Ranks
Does 30/60/90/120/150 + 30% AP
Slows For 15%/20%/25%/30%/35%

E: Haunting Scream - (Cone + Fear)
Screams At Cursor Fearing All Enemies In A Cone For 1 Second
Cool-Down 10-9-8-7-6 Seconds

R: Ethereal Halt - ( A.O.E + Stun + Stasis )
Lets Out A Burst Of Spectral Energy That Places All units Into
"Ethereal" In This State One Cant Move Cast Spells Attack Be Attacked Or Use Items
Mana-Cost 75/100/125
Cool-Down 100/80/60
Does 100/250/400 + 50% AP
Ethereal Lasts 3/4/5 Seconds

replies.body:
Wtf is this op shit .... 2 second fear??? ... 200+75% ap Q .... huge blink... and makes enemies useless 

No way

did some fixes changed the fear a bit shortened the blink and removed the damage i used the wrong word on the ult i meant to use all units not all enemy's thanks for pointing that out as for the q it is his main source of damage so he kinda needs it to be a relevant threat. opinion?
Well now his ult is useless
its more of a set up ult not a mid fight one its main purpose would be to give your team time to set up
